title: HeroTech Assembly and Fulfilment Officer
description:
Hi, we're HeroTech! We have a mission to inspire and empower real-life heroes. We are looking for an assembly and fulfilment officer to handle the process of making and shipping WEB-12 functional thread shooters. Check us out here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VdetRQJZYUU

The job is extremely flexible, work-from-home, and you can choose your hours as you please. We provide all tools and materials to fulfil the orders. We pay $10 per WEB-12 order made. It takes about 1 hour to fulfil one WEB-12 order. Most time is spent assembling/building the WEB-12 functional thread shooter.

Roles and responsibilities:
1. Reply to all messages on Etsy
2. Check Etsy for order details
3. Receive parts and materials from CEO
4. Build order
5. Conduct quality control check
6. Prepare order for shipping
7. Ship order (EasyShip platform)
8. Update inventory

If you're interested do message us with your Name, Age, and why you want to work for HeroTech. If you have a resume that would be appreciated as well.

title: Retail & Customer Service Associate
description:
About Us

Rentadella, a sustainable fashion rental company carrying gorgeous designer apparels from around the world for every occasion - from brunch to gala, birthdays to weddings and everything in between! We carry sizes from UK2 - UK20 to help you find the perfect dress of your dreams without having to break the bank or the planet!

Main Responsibilities (not limited to)

  • Managing day to day operations (from Administration duties to customer service)
  • Handling customer queries/feedback in the showroom and online (appointment bookings, handling feedbacks)
  • Rental Garments (steaming garments, packing garments for collection, receiving garments, uploading product on website, quality check on garments)
  • Providing the best customer service in the showroom and online
  • Upkeep showroom to ensure a clean environment for customers during their try-on appointments
  • Liaise with Operations Manager on showroom matters

What we are looking for :

  • Someone who loves fashion & making women feel beautiful!
  • Well-versed in IT Knowledge : Basic Operating Knowledge
  • Excellent customer service oriented
  • Great at multitasking during busy periods
  • Able to work independently and a team player, communicate well among team
  • Takes INITIATIVE & willingness to learn
  • Quick witted in problem solving and making decisions when there is no one to confide in
  • Is strong and confident with great communication skills. Needs to have a kind, friendly demeanour but firm attitude
  • As we handle styling for a lot of celebrity clientele, we require the associate to act professional at all times (refrain from photo taking or act abnormal towards the client).
  • Good stress management, needs to be calm and level headed when issues arise that need to be tackled
  • We require a 1 month probation period and a minimum of 1 year commitment to the job.

Related Sales Experience: Ideally 1 year & above

Working Hours: Monday - Thursday 11am-8pm, Sunday 9am-6pm (with a hour lunch break)

14 DAYS ANNUAL LEAVE

EMPLOYEE DISCOUNT ON DRESS RENTALS

title: Full Time Warehouse Assistant (Walk-in Interview)
description:
Walk-in Interviews are Open!


Do you love food and convenience put together? Then you just might love foodpanda.

foodpanda is the leading, on-demand food delivery company in Singapore, bringing thousands of your best loved restaurants online into your home or office - fast!

We are looking for a self-driven and motivated Full Time Warehouse Assistant to support the daily operations of the warehouse in Singapore. Able to work on shift based work patterns.
